name: Bañ a xàddi
description: Mën a wéy di def sa liggeey, ba noppi nekk ku am pasteef te mën a muñ njariñ li war a tukkee ci li ñu liggeey, ak lu mu yàgg yàgg nag.
questions: Can you recall a time when your patience eventually paid off?
What helps you sustain your efforts when progress seems slow?
How do you handle feelings of discouragement?
